author: Samuel Hamilton
comment: Looks amazing love what it could do.  Please fix the Google fit implementation.  It does not update unless you reboot your watch.  I have it set to two min updates.  That is not useful when you can't get an accurate read on your data.  I will rate a 5 star when all the features I paid for works.

author: Keefer Tech
comment: It installed very easily and looks awesome. It is hard on battery life and very sluggish. I have a ZenWatch 3. If this was fixed I'd give this 5 stars and maybe buy it. I'm not sure what is wrong because other very detailed faces work great!

author: vishnu chandar
comment: Excellent! Face has a good resolution! Crisp!  But the lock which appears on right top doesn't work! I tap on it and the symbol turns to "locked" but still I m able to access ! Screen doesn't get locked!  Please let me know what that lock is for! And finally please find battery consumption! It gets drained rapidly

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, the lock icon is available only in premium version. If you have premium option, send us an email and we will investigate the issue.

author: Ron West
comment: The faces themselves are great. But the uncontrollable promotion of other faces I should be buying as notifications periodically makes me want nothing to do with this product.

Love the look of the face, but had a hard time getting installed on my watch an still cannot get the step counter to work....to see my step I need to change to a different face watch....so I know it's the face or the user that has an issue.

author: John McGraw Jr
comment: While I really like the design I never realized how horrible it is on the watch battery. Some days I can only get 10 hours out of my new watch that is estimated to last 3 days.

author: Srinath V
comment: Installed it for my wear24. Watch face didnt show up initially. But got fixed later after installing thru App on watch

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you have to install watch face from Google play store located on your watch.

author: jason holroyd
comment: Google fit data does not refresh or update been standing still all day

author: Jeff Wahlund
comment: Works very well and I can see everything on the watch face.  Good customization. Needs better instructions for old people.

author: Hussein jazzar
comment: I liked the interface and hope for more colors

author: Rjohnnelson Nelson
comment: Different types styles

author: ARUN VYAS
comment: Good looking watch face

author: Louie Martinez
comment: Thanks for all the great free faces!!!!!

author: John Moore
comment: Really good looking watch

author: M P
comment: Do not install. Drains the battery super quick and keeps the CPU usage up about 80-90 percent all the time. Also even though you can change the temperature unit it always shows it in Farenheit. Uninstalled.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what kind of watch you have? Please try to reinstall the app.

author: Michael Frey
comment: What exactly did I pay for?Come on!! it does the same things on free version

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: No, it doesn't. You can't track google fit data, nor change weather provider and other additional options.

author: Pat McCombie
comment: This is not the first watch face pic I have purchased, but it is the first that will not download to my watch. So, valueless.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you have to install it from Wear store located on the watch. That is way how Android Wear 2.0 works.

author: Mike Le Gray
comment: My favourite watch face, without a doubt. Fully featured and really good looking.

author: Tarun Kant
comment: Best ever.I love it on my Moto 360 2nd Gen. Keep coming back it , time and again.

author: Amer Abouhamze
comment: Too many ads on my phone even when not using the app! No thanks! Uninstalled.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
That's push which is sent only once a month.
You have that in description. If you don't want to get any notification, please, disable the option in the companion app.

author: Sudhir JS
comment: I have purchased the premium version, but the app still shows buy premium. Pls help

author: Qban Celli
comment: Awesome!

author: Walter Burnell
comment: Disappointed the developer does not respond to emails - especially when you've paid for the app. Reported problem with "needle" not lining up properly with current temp (nice concept, poor execution.)

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, we didn't get any emails from you. Please, send us an email again.

author: David West-Robinson
comment: I installed Fury Abdul paid for it and loved it but since resetting watch to factory defaults I am unable to get it back. Not showing on android app or watch. Loved the face just frustrated I can't get it back. Feel like I've lost my money. Would love to give 5 stars

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, try to disconnect and reconnect watch  again.

author: Phil Harnett
comment: Love this watch face but the phone battery indicator hasn't worked since install. If that worked I would give it a 5.  Update I found what was wrong so now happy to give 5.

author: Leon Fowler
comment: Like the watch face quick question, the color bar on the outside between zero and 15 does it serve a purpose can I move it can I edit it ? so the little marks between the 5055 the five the 10 to 20 to 25 to 35 to 40 are they supposed to be cards or something that we can edit?

author: William Sheff
comment: I use to really like this watchface, but recently it continues to reset the colors back to gray. It's just irritating. Don't waist your time or money.

author: Dan Fredericks
comment: 2 things 1 can't do a thing with this app. 2 who can a person take this app in good faith when they can't even get the name right for the DIAL. It is called a file not a face. Yes I really am a watch maker.

author: Adam T
comment: Been using some RichFace designs for a while now.  Today this one displayed a notification ad that surprised me.  Not a fan of apps doing this at all.  Sorry might not use anymore RichFace designs after this.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

You have it in description. Once a month we send notification and you can disable it in settings app anytime. Regards

author: Robert McKenna
comment: Not able to fury watch face to watch. And I do have 2.0 version

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you have to install Fury from Google Wear store on your watch.

comment: I am using my mobile Samsung S7, I have downloaded and installed the app, but cannot find it appear on my watch - LG Model W150.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, does your watch run Wear 2.0? If yes, then install Fury from google wear store on your watch.UPDATE: Any news about your issue? If you still have a problem, send us an email and we will be happy to help you.

author: Leivur Jarnfoss
comment: Total rip off. Bought premium, but found out that, you had to buy several premium packages to open it all.

author: Omar Torres
comment: Looks great and love the complications,but needs to have a method to zoom the screen for us with watches that already have numbered bezel. Having double numbered bezels is redundant

author: Oleg Ignatyev
comment: Good face, but when chosing external complications - they are not centered in their small windows ... Might be also good to have more colors available

author: Mike S
comment: Lovely looking watchface it looks brilliant, love the ability to change settings on the watch itself for different colours and settings rather than need the phone. Well designed

author: Larry Edwards
comment: Paid for premium and not working.....l ripoff....still shows free version will delete and stay away from these

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, did you enabled premium in config app? Regards

comment: Google fit sync seems to have an issue on g watch r with wear 2.0. Update fixed it - thanks!  Nice Watchface.

author: ira jackson
comment: Update on watch finally got it to work will update again after i use it for a while

author: Aaron Morrone
comment: Got it working after following advice from quick reaonse from RichFace and it works.  Awesome watch face and so much customization available

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

Download it via wear store directly on your watch. 

Regards

author: s john guha
comment: Battery indicators and weather stopped working after 2 weeks.
